MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:39pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area to investigate and repair the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
